channel.title: MIS on NS News and Views
channel.description: Recent content in MIS on NS News and Views

item.title: Power BI + iSAMS API
item.description: Like many people, I’ve tinkered with Power BI over the years but have never really dug deep into the weeds; the same can also be said for the iSAMS REST API.

item.title: Excel Macro to manipulate CAT data
item.description: Recently, I was asked whether I could provide some assistance with manipulating data, that had been exported from a CAT results test. The problem, had slowly been driving a colleague of mine, very slightly crazy!

item.title: Stamp an iSAMS report with the current username
item.description: During the summer of 2014, we migrated the St Mary’s Shaftesbury MIS (Management Information System) from Schoolbase to iSAMS. Please note, that the reasons for instigating this major system change, and the processes involved (political & technical), are not covered in this blog post.

item.title: Schoolbase Rewards and Sanctions via email
item.description: At St Mary’s Shaftesbury, one of the many additional functions we have built, to work alongside our Schoolbase MIS (Management Information System), is the automation of a weekly ‘Rewards and Sanctions’ report.
